verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> '' After <S%G3326><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Six <S%G1803><s%> Takes With Him <S%G3880><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brings Up <S%G399><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> <S%G5308><s%> ' High <S%G2596><s%> Apart. <S%G2398><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Transfigured <S%G3339><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shone <S%G2989><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> His Face <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments <S%G846><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light; <S%G5457><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Talking. <S%G4814><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> For Us <S%G2248><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> To Be. <S%G1511><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Wilt, <S%G2309><s%> Let Us Make <S%G4160><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%>, Tabernacles : <S%G4633><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For Moses <S%G3475><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520><s%> For Elijah. <S%G2243><s%>

While Yet <S%G2089><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was Speaking, <S%G2980><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> A Cloud <S%G3507><s%> Bright <S%G5460><s%> Overshadowed <S%G1982><s%>, Them : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud, <S%G3507><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Beloved, <S%G27><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Have Found Delight : <S%G2106><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Hear Ye. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Hearing It <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Their Faces, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Terrified <S%G5399><s%> Greatly. <S%G4970><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Them <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Rise Up, <S%G1453><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Terrified. <S%G5399><s%>

Having Lifted Up <S%G1869><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Their Eyes <S%G846><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Alone. <S%G3441><s%> <S%G3440><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As Were Descending <S%G2597><s%> They <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> Charged <S%G1781><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vision, <S%G3705><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Be Risen. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> First? <S%G4412><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Restore <S%G600><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

But <S%G3004><s%> I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Is Come, <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Knew Not <S%G1921><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> To <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Whatever <S%G3745><s%> They Desired. <S%G2309><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Suffer <S%G3958><s%> ' From <S%G5259><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Understood <S%G4920><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist <S%G910><s%> He Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> They <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Kneeling Down To <S%G1120><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Have Pity On <S%G1653><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Son, <S%G5207><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> He Is Lunatic <S%G4583><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Miserably <S%G2560><s%> Suffers : <S%G3958><s%> <S%G4178><s%> For Often <S%G1063><s%> He Falls <S%G4098><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fire, <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Often <S%G4178><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water. <S%G5204><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Brought <S%G4374><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To Thy Disciples, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Were Not Able <S%G1410><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Heal. <S%G2323><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> O 5599 INJ Generation 1074 N-VSF Unbelieving 571 A-VSF And 2532 CONJ Perverted, 1294 V-RPP-NSF Until 2193 CONJ When 4219 PRT-I Shall I Be 2071 V-FXI-1S '' With 3326 PREP You? 5216 P-2GP Until 2193 CONJ When 4219 PRT-I Shall I Bear With 430 V-FDI-1S You? 5216 P-2GP Bring 5342 V-PAM-2P To Me 3427 P-1DS Him 846 P-ASM Here. 5602 ADV

And <S%G2532><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon, <S%G1140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Healed <S%G2323><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boy <S%G3816><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5610><s%> That Hour. <S%G1565><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> ' To Jesus <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Unbelief <S%G570><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%> <S%G281><s%> For Verily <S%G1063><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Grain <S%G2848><s%> Of Mustard, <S%G4615><s%> Ye Shall Say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> To This, <S%G5129><s%> Remove <S%G3327><s%> Hence <S%G1782><s%> Thither, <S%G1563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Shall Remove; <S%G3327><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Shall Be Impossible <S%G101><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But This Kind <S%G1085><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Goes Not Out <S%G1607><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fasting. <S%G3521><s%>

<S%G390><s%> And While Were Abiding <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To Be Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Kill <S%G615><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Shall Be Raised Up. <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Grieved <S%G3076><s%> Greatly. <S%G4970><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> And Having Come <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%>, Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Didrachmas <S%G1323><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does He Not Pay <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Didrachmas? <S%G1323><s%>

He Says, <S%G3004><s%> Yes. <S%G3483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Anticipated <S%G4399><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5101><s%> What <S%G4671><s%> Thinkest Thou, <S%G1380><s%> Simon? <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Do They Receive <S%G2983><s%> Custom <S%G5056><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Tribute? <S%G2778><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Their Sons, <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Strangers? <S%G245><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Peter, <S%G4074><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Strangers. <S%G245><s%> Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Then Indeed <S%G686><s%> Free <S%G1658><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons. <S%G5207><s%>

<S%G2443><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But That <S%G3361><s%> We May Not Offend <S%G4624><s%>, Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> A Hook, <S%G44><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming Up <S%G305><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Fish <S%G2486><s%> Take, <S%G142><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Its Mouth <S%G846><s%> Thou Shalt Find <S%G2147><s%> A Stater; <S%G4715><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> For <S%G473><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thee. <S%G4675><s%>
